Typedef cef_context_menu_media_state_flags_t

   in cef_types.h

Supported context menu media state bit flags.



Details

cef_context_menu_media_state_flags_t

public typedef enum { CM_MEDIAFLAG_NONE = 0, CM_MEDIAFLAG_ERROR = 1<< 0, CM_MEDIAFLAG_PAUSED = 1<< 1, CM_MEDIAFLAG_MUTED = 1<< 2, CM_MEDIAFLAG_LOOP = 1<< 3, CM_MEDIAFLAG_CAN_SAVE = 1<< 4, CM_MEDIAFLAG_HAS_AUDIO = 1<< 5, CM_MEDIAFLAG_HAS_VIDEO = 1<< 6, CM_MEDIAFLAG_CONTROL_ROOT_ELEMENT = 1<< 7, CM_MEDIAFLAG_CAN_PRINT = 1<< 8, CM_MEDIAFLAG_CAN_ROTATE = 1<< 9, } cef_context_menu_media_state_flags_t;
